data: Bianat has developed a comprehensive platform for the analysis of financial data
GAN-based system trained on C-TimesBlock for financial forecasting
Improvement in the market for the DJIA index (2000-2023)
Established a new method for assessing the impact of economic and social factors
Bianat's models with tailored techniques from research
Analyzed the emotional impact of financial news
10 algorithms developed, 12 features extracted, real-time sentiment analysis
Enhanced performance using advanced sentiment features
